title: A Really Long Straw | Scientific American
body: Preparation. Have an adult help to cut two half-inch slits, across from one another, lengthwise in one end of a plastic straw. These cuts will help you slip the end of one straw over another one ...
readable_content: -User (2023-12-08): The following text explains the science of sipping through a straw, along with a project to create and test a super-long straw. It also includes background information, material lists, procedures, and observations and results.
summary:
